infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app finds nearby venues by your GPS location. It also allows ordering from and delivery to your GPS location.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app finds nearby venues by your GPS location. It also allows ordering from and delivery to your GPS location.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app finds nearby venues by your GPS location. It also allows ordering from and delivery to your GPS location.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app allows you to add user-generated photos and videos to menu items.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app allows you to add user-generated photos and videos to menu items.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app allows you to add user-generated photos and videos to menu items.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app allows you to add user-generated videos to menu items.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Tracking is used to improve the app update experience.
